st: जब भी आईने में खुद से नज़रे मिलाओगे,
s:
जब भी आईने में खुद से नज़रे मिलाओगे,
अपनी आँखों में तुम नक्श मेरा पाओगे,
किसी दिन इन्तजार में मर जाऊँगा मैं,
फिर बताओ नया ‘प्रवेश’ कहाँ से लाओगे.

st: Tadap ke dekho kisi ki chahat mein,
s:
Tadap ke dekho kisi ki chahat mein,
to pata chale ki intezaar kya hota hai,
yu hi mil jaaye koi bina chahe,
to kaise pata chale ke pyaar kya hota hai.

st: Toot Rahi Hai Saanse Magar Intezaar Abhi Baki Hai,
s:
Toot Rahi Hai Saanse Magar Intezaar Abhi Baki Hai,
Aane Se Pehle Jayenge Nahi Ye Aas Abhi Baki Hai,
Dekhna Hai Kab Aate Hai Wo Aakhiri Waqt Mein,
mujhe Kehni Hai Unse jo Dil Ki Baat Abhi Baki Hai.

st: Dil Ye Hamara Bekarar Ho Raha Hai,
s:
Dil Ye Hamara Bekarar Ho Raha Hai,
Lagta Hai Hume Aapse Pyar Ho Raha Hai,
Aap Aa Jaiye Yaha Jaldi Se,
Aapka Besabri Se Intezaar Ho Raha Hai.

st: Iss had tak hame sataya mat karo,
s:
Iss had tak hame sataya mat karo,
jaan bhooj kar bhoolaya mat karo,
jo hum kar de ek sms tumhe,
Phir hame sms ka intezaar karwaya mat karo.

st: Mohobbat ka imtihan aasan nahi,
s:
Mohobbat ka imtihan aasan nahi,
Pyaar sirf paane ka to naam nahi,
Muddate beet jati hai kisi ke intezaar mein,
Ye sirf pal-do-pal ka kaam nahi.

st: Tumhari yaadon ki mehak in hawao mein hai,
s:
Tumhari yaadon ki mehak in hawao mein hai,
Pyaar hi Pyaar bikhra in fizao mein hai,
aisa na ho ki duriya dard ban jaaye,
ab to aapke msg ka intezaar nigahon mein hai.

st: Har roz hota hai tarruf mera teri yaadon se,
s:
Har roz hota hai tarruf mera teri yaadon se,
Chalakta hai noor tera meri aankhon se,
Tadap raha hoon main aur ab ye alam hai,
Aur intezaar nahi hota ab meri saanso se.

st: Husn walo hume aise staya na karo,
s:
Husn walo hume aise staya na karo,
mohabbat ki shama pal-bhar mein bujhaya na karo,
intezaar ki ye ghadiya kayamat-si lagti h,
n aana ho to hume akele mein bulaya na karo.

st: Meri tanhai tumhe awaaj de rahi hai,
s:
Meri tanhai tumhe awaaj de rahi hai,
dil ki dhadkan tumhe awaaz de rahi hai,
aa bhi ja ki bahut intezaar kiya maine,
ye shok fiza tumhe awaaj de rahi hai.

st: Nazro se jab nazar ka takrar hota hai,
s:
Nazro se jab nazar ka takrar hota hai,
har mod par kisi ka intezaar hota hai,
dil rota hai zakham haste hai,
shayad isi ka naam to pyar hota hai.

st: Mar kar bhi tadapti hu tere intezaar mein,
s:
Mar kar bhi tadapti hu tere intezaar mein,
Aag lag gayi hai mere is dil-e-bekraar mein,
Milne ka maza hai jo intezaar mein,
Dard ubharta hai kadam rakhte hi pyar mein.

st: Yu palke bicha ke tera intezaar karte hai,
s:
Yu palke bicha ke tera intezaar karte hai,
Ye wo gunah hai jo hum baar baar karte hai,
Jalakar hasrat ki raah pe chirag,
Hum subah aur sham tera intezaar karte hai.

st: zakhm itna gehra hai izhaar kya kare,
s:
zakhm itna gehra hai izhaar kya kare,
hum khud nishana ban gaye waar kya kare,
soo gaye hum magar khuli rahi aankhen,
iss se zyada hum unka intezaar kya kare.

st: Tere intezaar mein palke bichaye baithe hai,
s:
Tere intezaar mein palke bichaye baithe hai,
wo aayenge esiliye ummid jagaye baithe hai,
na todna kabhi milne ka waada mujhse,
ki hum ab to apni jaan ki bazi lagaye baithe hai.

st: Fhasle mita kar aa-pas mein pyaar rakhna,
s:
Fhasle mita kar aa-pas mein pyaar rakhna,
dosti ka ye rishta hamesha barkaraar rakhna,
bichhad jaaye beshaq kabhi aapse hum,
aankhon mein hamesha hamara intezaar rakhna.

st: Har Shaam Se Tera Izhaar Kiya Karte Hai,
s:
Har Shaam Se Tera Izhaar Kiya Karte Hai,
Har Khawab Mein Tera Deedar Kiya Karte Hai,
Deewane Hi To Hai Ham Tere,
Jo Har Waqt Tere Milne Ka Inetzaar Kiya Karte Hai.

st: Jaam tutne ka bahana na kiya kar,
s:
Jaam tutne ka bahana na kiya kar,
Ham to teri aankho se pee lenge,
Tu mat aa lekin aane ka waada to kar,
Ham tere intezaar mein hi jee lenge.

st: Wo Paas Aate To Ham Baat Kar Lete,
s:
Wo Paas Aate To Ham Baat Kar Lete,
Wo Sath Rehte To Ham Pyaar Kar Lete,
Kya Majburiya Thi Jo chale gaye door,
Wajah To Btate Ham Intezaar Kar Lete.

st: Kya Karunga Uska Intezaar Karke,
s:
Kya Karunga Uska Intezaar Karke,
Jab Chali Gayi Wo Mujhe Barbaad Karke,
Socha Tha Apna Bhi yaha Ek Jaha Hoga,
Magar Mili Sirf Tanhai Usse Pyar Karke.

st: Zindagi khoobsurat Hai Isse Pyaar Karo,
s:
Zindagi khoobsurat Hai Isse Pyaar Karo,
Har Raat Ki Nayi Subha Ka Intezaar Karo,
Wo Pal Bhi Aayega Jiska Intezaar aapko Hai,
Bas Rab Par Bharosa Aur Waqt par Aitbaar Karo.

st: Khwabo mein jeena jab aadat ban jaati hai,
s:
Khwabo mein jeena jab aadat ban jaati hai,
Haqikat ki duniya berang nazar aati hai,
Koi intezaar karta hai zindagi ke liye,
Aur kisi ki zindagi intezaar mein guzar jati hai.

st: Toot gaya hai dil par armaan wahi hai,
s:
Toot gaya hai dil par armaan wahi hai,
Door rehte hai phir bhi pyaar  wahi hai,
Jante hai hum ki Tum mil nahi  sakte,
Magar in aankhon me intezaar  wahi hai.

st: Wo Paas hote To Hum Baat Kar Lete,
s:
Wo Paas hote To Hum Baat Kar Lete,
Wo Saath Rehte To Hum Pyar Kar Lete,
Kya Majburi Thi unki Jo Wo Door Chale Gaye,
Wajah jo Btate  to Hum Intezaar Kar Lete.

st: Uss Ajnabi Ka Yoon Intezaar Na Karo,
s:
Uss Ajnabi Ka Yoon Intezaar Na Karo,
Uss Ashiq Dil Ka Aitbaar Na Karo,
Roz Nikla Kare Kisi Ki Yaad Me Aansu,
Itna Kabhi Kisi Se Pyar Na Karo.

st: Samne na ho to tarasti hai aankhen,
s:
Samne na ho to tarasti hai aankhen,
Yaad mein teri barasti hai aankhen,
Mere liye nahi inke liye hi aa jao,
Aap ka Hi intezaar karti hai aankhe.

st: Hum apne aap mein yu gum hue hai muddat se,
s:
Hum apne aap mein yu gum hue hai muddat se,
hame to jaise kisi ka bhi intezaar nahi,
kisi ko toot kar chahae ya chah kar tooten,
hamare paas to itna bhi ikhtiyaar nahi.

st: Yu palke bicha ke tera intezaar karte hai,
s:
Yu palke bicha ke tera intezaar karte hai,
Bas ye gunah hi hai jo hum baar baar karte hai,
hasrat ki raah pe jala kar chirag,
Hum subh aur sham tera intezaar karte hai.

st: Aasmaan ke taare aksar pucha karte hai,
s:
Aasmaan ke taare aksar pucha karte hai,
kya tumhe ab bhi intezaar hai uske laut aane ka,
aur dil muskura ke kehta hai,
mujhe to ab bhi yakeen nahi uske jaane ka.

st: Aasmaan ke taare aksar pucha karte hai,
s:
Aasmaan ke taare aksar pucha karte hai,
kiya tumhe ab bhi intezaar hain uske laut aane ka,
aur mera dil bhi  muskura ke kehta hai,
mujhe to ab bhi yakeen nahi uske jaane ka.

st: Dil mere seene se chura raha hai koi,
s:
Dil mere seene se chura raha hai koi,
Dur hokar bhi yaad aa raha hai koi,
Aye khuda mujhe usse ek bar mila de,
Intezaar mere liye kar raha hai koi.

st: Chal ham tera intezaar karte hai,
s:
Chal ham tera intezaar karte hai,
Bata to ja tu ayega kab tak,
Mere lafzo ki bas kadar karna,
Mai yuhi teri yadon m rahunga Zindgi bhar.

st: Chahat Se Teri Ankho Mein Doobe,
s:
Chahat Se Teri Ankho Mein Doobe,
Nafrat Se Aansu Bankar Uchle,

Gire Jo Farsh Pe Toote Aise,
Rehza Rehza Dil Bikhra Jaise,

Umeed-E-Wafa Kare Kaise,
Zubaan-E-Haal Kahe Kiss Se,

Salaam-E-Dil-E-Muztar,
Khamosh Mohabbat Mein Hai Intezaar.

st: Najro se najro ka takraav hota hai,
s:
Najro se najro ka takraav hota hai,
Har mod par kisi ka intezaar hota hai,
Dil rota hai aur jakhm haste hai,
Shayad Isi ka naam pyaar hota hai.

st: Kitne Din Beet gaye na hua Deedar tera,
s:
Kitne Din Beet gaye na hua Deedar tera,
Ab to harpal mujhko hai intezaar tera,
Shukr hai jo har tasveer me nazar wo aaye,
Ab to tasveero se bhi jhalake hai pyar tera.

st: Aaj Ujhaloon Mein Ek Kami Si Rehne De,
s:
Aaj Ujhaloon Mein Ek Kami Si Rehne De,
Aankhoon Mein Ek Katra Nammi Si Rehne De,
Reh Na Jaaye Mohabbat Adhuri Meri,
Intezaar Hai Uska Intezaar Hi Rehne De.

st: roj aate hai chand sitare magar,
s:
roj aate hai chand sitare magar,
koi khushi ka paigam nahi aata,
hame to intezaar hai jinke sms ka par,
unhe hamara khayal hi nahi aata.

st: Tum mile har khushi mil gayi hai hame,
s:
Tum mile har khushi mil gayi hai hame,
Lagta hai ki dusri zindagi mil gayi hai hame.
Zindagi me Jiska tha saalo se intezaar hame,
Jeevan ka saathi bina maange mil gaya hame.

st: Kya bataye Pyar kaisa hota hai,
s:
Kya bataye Pyar kaisa hota hai,
Kabhi karar to kabhi bekrar hota hai,
Ajeb halchal hoti hai us waqt Dil me,
Jab kisi ko kisi ka intezar hota hai.

st: Ek dard thi unki aankhon me mere bagair,
s:
Ek dard thi unki aankhon me mere bagair,
ek aah thi unki jubaan me mere bagair.
Ro rahe the mere intezaar me wo iss kadar,
ki ek Roti Si Aahe thi unki awaaj me mere bagair.

st: Kabhi – kabhi khyalo mein tera intezaar karte hai,
s:
Kabhi – kabhi khyalo mein tera intezaar karte hai,
yu hi mere dosto, hum khija se bahar bharte hai,
sham hote hi ik  tadap si bhar jati hai dil mein,
apni tanhaiyo se sanam hum bahut pyar karte hai,

st: Aa laut ke aaja, tumhe khuda ka wasta,
s:
Aa laut ke aaja, tumhe khuda ka wasta,
meri kushiya mujhe de ja, tumhe khuda ka wasta,
ik zamane se tere intezaar mein tadpata raha hu,
tanha nahi kata kabhi jawani ka rasta.

st: Nazar chahti hai jee bhar deedar karna,
s:
Nazar chahti hai jee bhar deedar karna,
dil chahta hai jee bhar ke pyar karna,
kya batayein is dil ka aalam ab hum,
naseeb mein likha hai beinteha intezaar karna.

st: Udas Aankhon Mein Sabar Dekha Hain,
s:
Udas Aankhon Mein Sabar Dekha Hain,
Pehli Bar Use Itna Khush Aur Beqarar Dekha Hain,
Jise faraq Na padta Tha Mere Aane Jane se,
Uski Ankhon Mein hi Ab maine Intezaar Dekha Hain.

st: Kuch nasha teri baat ka hain,
s:
Kuch nasha teri baat ka hain,
Kuch nasha dhimi barsaat ka hain,
Hum to kabse nashe me doob jaane ko tayaar hain,
Intezaar to sirf aapki mulaqat ka hain.

st: Ek ajnabi se mujhe itna pyaar kyun hain,
s:
Ek ajnabi se mujhe itna pyaar kyun hain,
Inkaar karne par chahat ka ikraar kyun hain,
Use paana nahi meri taqdeer me shayad,
Phir har mod pe usi ka mujhe intezaar kyun hain.

st: Bewafa hai duniya kisi ka aitbaar na karo,
s:
Bewafa hai duniya kisi ka aitbaar na karo,
Har pal dete hai dhoka kisi se pyar na karo,
Mit jao beshaq tanha jee kar,
Par kisi ke sath ka intezaar na karo.

st: Ek Ajnabi Se Mujhe Itna Pyar Kyun Hain,
s:
Ek Ajnabi Se Mujhe Itna Pyar Kyun Hain,
Inkar Karne Par Bhi Chahat Ka Ikarar Kyun Hain,
Use Pana Nahi Hai Meri Taqdeer Mein Shayad ,
Phir Bhi Har Mod Pe Usika Intezaar Kyu Hain.

st: Sukhe patton se pyaar kar lenge,
s:
Sukhe patton se pyaar kar lenge,
Hum to tum par aitbaar kar lenge,
Tum ye to kaho, tum humare ho sanam,
Hum zindagi bhar intezaar kar lenge.

st: Honth nahi keh sakte jo afsana dil ka,
s:
Honth nahi keh sakte jo afsana dil ka,
Shayad nazar se wo baat ho jaye,
Iss umeed se karte hai intezaar raat ka ki,
Shayad sapno me mulaqat ho jaye.

st: intezaar ki aarzu ab kho gayi hai,
s:
intezaar ki aarzu ab kho gayi hai,
Khamoshiyo ki aadat ho gayi hai,
Na sikwa raha na shikayt kisi se,
Agar hai to ek mohabbat,
jo in tanhayion se ho gayi hai.

st: Dil mein intezaar ki lakeer chod jayenge,
s:
Dil mein intezaar ki lakeer chod jayenge,
Aankho mein yaado ki nami chod jayenge,
Dhundte firoge hum ek din,
zindagi mein ek yaar ki kami chod jayenge.

st: Ghar chuta, gaon chuta aur chut gaya hai pyar bhi,
s:
Ghar chuta, gaon chuta aur chut gaya hai pyar bhi,
rab rutha, sansar rutha aur ruth gaya hai pyar bhi,
dil mera toda usne , ye bhi koi baat nahi,
yaaro, dil mein dard hai mujhko to hai intezaar abhi bhi.

st: Kab unki palko mein intezaar hoga,
s:
Kab unki palko mein intezaar hoga,
dil ke kisi kone mein humare liye pyar hoga,
gujar rahi hai raat unki yaad mein,
kabhi to unko bhi humara intezaar hoga.
